title: A ranked win in my promos did not count?
body:
I won my first game in promos (yes I made sure it said I was in my promos), then my second. On all of the league profile sites, it says I only have one check mark or one win out of the three needed to progress. My match history begs to differ...
Is this a bug or something that I can have fixed?
Thanks.

replies.body: I took a look into this for you, and everything looks okay!  It may take a moment for match history to update, including any third party sites.  We don't support these third party sites, and cannot force them to provide updates.  I hope that helps clear things up, and wish you the best of luck in your series!

Awesome thank you!
I literally did not know where to see this on the app... I feel like an idiot ahaha.
Thanks again!

I'm not currently in a series, but if I recall currently, it should be in your profile page!  In the client, go to your Profile and select Leagues.  The left side should show your division's ladderboard, and the right should provide your series progress so far with green checkmarks.
Those sites are simply not updated. Just check your profile from the client, you have 2 wins.
